SELECT tpa.id, tpa.id as preferential, tpa.code, tpa.name, tpa.name_first_letter, tpa.type, tpa.type_name, tpa.subtable_name, tpa.sub_type, tpa.sub_type_name, tpa.color, tpa.starttime, tpa.endtime, tpa.apply_all, tpa.activity_introduction, tpa.use_notice, tpa.createtime, tpa.creator FROM t_p_preferential_activity tpa
and tpa.apply_all=1
UNION SELECT tpa.id, tpa.id as preferential, tpa.code, tpa.name, tpa.name_first_letter, tpa.type, tpa.type_name, tpa.subtable_name, tpa.sub_type, tpa.sub_type_name, tpa.color, tpa.starttime, tpa.endtime, tpa.apply_all, tpa.activity_introduction, tpa.use_notice, tpa.createtime, tpa.creator FROM t_p_preferential_activity tpa
and tpa.apply_all=0 and exists ( select * from t_p_preferential_branch where branch=#{branchid} and preferential=tpa.id )
ORDER BY code

SELECT det.id, det.preferential, det.dish, det.dish_title, det.price, det.sequence, det.unit, det.unitflag, det.discount, det.amount, det.bill_amount, det.free_reason, det.company_name, det.company_first_letter, det.can_credit, tpa.code, tpa.name, tpa.name_first_letter, tpa.type, tpa.type_name, tpa.subtable_name, tpa.sub_type, tpa.sub_type_name, tpa.color, tpa.apply_all, tpa.activity_introduction, tpa.use_notice, tpa.starttime, tpa.endtime FROM t_p_preferential_detail det ,t_p_preferential_activity tpa WHERE det.preferential = tpa.id and (tpa.`status` is null or tpa.status !='1') AND tpa.type not in(01,02,03,04,05,06,0601,0602,08) and tpa.apply_all=1
UNION SELECT det.id, det.preferential, det.dish, det.dish_title, det.price, det.sequence, det.unit, det.unitflag, det.discount, det.amount, det.bill_amount, det.free_reason, det.company_name, det.company_first_letter, det.can_credit, tpa.code, tpa.name, tpa.name_first_letter, tpa.type, tpa.type_name, tpa.subtable_name, tpa.sub_type, tpa.sub_type_name, tpa.color, tpa.apply_all, tpa.activity_introduction, tpa.use_notice, tpa.starttime, tpa.endtime FROM t_p_preferential_detail det ,t_p_preferential_activity tpa WHERE det.preferential = tpa.id and (tpa.`status` is null or tpa.status !='1')
AND tpa.type not in(01,02,03,04,05,06,0601,0602,08)
and tpa.apply_all=0 and exists ( select * from t_p_preferential_branch where branch=#{branchid} and preferential=tpa.id ) ORDER BY preferential , sequence
